TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyInfoName extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause

summary.span: 表示 XMLDSIG 或 XML 加密 元素的 子元素。

span.span: Represents a subelement of an XMLDSIG or XML Encryption element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ``元素包含在验证或解密 XML 文档使用来标识相应的键的字符串标识符。The `` element contains a string identifier that the party validating or decrypting an XML document uses to identify the corresponding key. 例如，如果你收到加密或签名 XML 文档具有``元素值的"AsymmetricKey1"，您将使用你和发件人具有名为密钥"AsymmetricKey1"解密或验证文档。For example, if you receive an encrypted or signed XML document that has a `` element value of "AsymmetricKey1", you will use a key that you and the sender have named "AsymmetricKey1" to decrypt or verify the document. 双方必须达成提前的密钥名称映射。Both parties must agree on a key name mapping ahead of time. 请注意，XML 文档中并未嵌入的实际密钥。Note that the actual key is not imbedded in the XML document. 有关详细信息``元素，请参阅 4.4.1 一部分 XMLDSIG 规范，这是可从在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)，或请参阅 XML 加密规范，即从可用在 www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/ W3C。For more information about the `` element, see Section 4.4.1 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用对象时签名由统一资源标识符 (URI) 表示的资源。The following code example uses the object when signing a resource represented by a Universal Resource Identifier (URI). 此示例将保存在新的文件的签名。This example saves the signature in a new file. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CPP/xmldsigdetach.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CS/xmldsigdetach.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/VB/xmldsigdetach.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用对象时签名 XML 文档。The following code example uses the object when signing an XML document. 此示例将保存在新的文件的签名。This example saves the signature in a new file. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用对象加密 XML 文档时。The following code example uses the object when encrypting an XML document. 此示例将嵌入到加密的 XML 文档中的加密的密钥。This example embeds an encrypted key within the encrypted XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用对象加密 XML 文档时。The following code example uses the object when encrypting an XML document. 此示例将一个名称映射到对称密钥来解密方法标识它。This example maps a name to a symmetric key to identify it to the decryption method. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/VB/sample.vb#1)]

span.span: The string identifier that is the value of the element.

summary.span: 通过指定字符串标识符来初始化 类的新实例，此字符串标识符是 元素的值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by specifying the string identifier that is the value of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `keyName`参数可以包含任意字符串，该字符串的解释取决于特定于应用程序。The `keyName` parameter can contain any string; the interpretation of the string is specific to the application. 为无意义空白的字符串值。White space is significant in the string value. `keyName`参数指定的值属性。The `keyName` parameter specifies the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的对象是适合用作 XMLDSIG 或 XML 加密的子元素``元素。The object returned by this method is suitable for use as a subelement of an XMLDSIG or XML Encryption `` element.

span.span: The string identifier that is the value of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以包含任意字符串，该字符串的解释取决于特定于应用程序。The property can contain any string; the interpretation of the string is specific to the application. 为无意义空白的字符串值。White space is significant in the string value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用对象时签名由统一资源标识符 (URI) 表示的资源。The following code example uses the object when signing a resource represented by a Universal Resource Identifier (URI). 此示例将保存在新的文件的签名。This example saves the signature in a new file.
